column2: Mix flour, water, yeast, salt. Knead, rise, shape. Bake at 450°F for 20-25 mins.
Cream butter, sugar, add eggs, vanilla, flour. Bake at 350°F for 20 mins. Frost.
Mix butter, sugar, eggs, flour, add chocolate chips. Bake at 350°F for 10 mins.
Mix flour, butter, cheese, bake at 400°F for 15 mins. Enjoy savory goodness!
Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, add eggs, milk, oil. Bake at 350°F for 30-35 mins.
Layer butter, fold dough, refrigerate. Shape, proof, bake at 375°F until golden.
Roll dough, spread cinnamon-sugar. Roll, slice, proof. Bake at 375°F for 20 mins.
